meanings.definition: To reduce (a dead body) to ashes by burning.
meanings.sent1: They will cremate the deceased at the funeral.
meanings.sent2: The family decided to cremate their loved one's remains.
meanings.sent3: The idea to cremate the turkey instead of roasting it was a hot topic at Thanksgiving dinner.
meanings.sent4: The bonfire was so intense, it seemed to cremate everything in its path.
meanings.sent5: The intense heat of the sun can almost cremate anything left in the car.

meanings.sent4: The wildfire was so fierce, it seemed to cremate everything in its path.
